15-1142.00.description: Install, configure, and support an organization's local area network (LAN), wide area network (WAN), and Internet systems or a segment of a network system. May supervise computer user support specialists and computer network support specialists. May administer network security measures.

15-1132.00.description: Develop, create, and modify general computer applications software or specialized utility programs. Analyze user needs and develop software solutions. Apply principles and techniques of computer science, engineering, and mathematical analysis.

15-1142.00.description: Install, configure, and support an organization's local area network (LAN), wide area network (WAN), and Internet systems or a segment of a network system. May supervise computer user support specialists and computer network support specialists. May administer network security measures.
